Package kaitech.database

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • kaitech.database.DatabaseHandler
  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The DatabaseHandler class controls the setup of database tables, connection to the database, and handles the creation of PreparedStatements for the database to run.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.sql.Connection dbConn
      The Connection to the database.
      private java.io.File dbFile
      The database file.
      private static java.lang.String[] setupScripts
      An array of setup script filepaths for the database handler to loop over and run individually.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DatabaseHandler​(java.io.File dbFile)

      Drops all database tables.
      java.sql.Connection getConn()

      Creates a PreparedStatement from the given SQL script file.

      Creates a PreparedStatement from the given String SQL query.
      java.sql.PreparedStatement prepareStream​(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Creates a PreparedStatement from the given input stream.
      void setup()
      Runs the setup of all tables in the database from the setup scripts declared in setupScripts.

      • dropAllTables

        public void dropAllTables()
        Drops all database tables. WARNING: This action is irreversible, and completely erases all data.
